content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in my newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I'm sure you'll find it to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. So, how much are you willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student so I'm on a tight budget. I was hoping for something around 500 euros a month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. I'm looking to get at least 800 euros a month for this apartment. It's a premium location with all the amenities nearby. I'm sure you understand that the value of this property is much higher than your initial offer. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 800 euros is a bit high for me. I can go up to 650 euros. I'm a dependable and responsible tenant, and I promise to take good care of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your effort, but 650 euros is still not what I'm looking for. This apartment is in high demand, and I could easily find a tenant who would be willing to pay the full 800 euros. However, I'm willing to negotiate a bit further. How about 750 euros? That's a fair price considering the location and the quality of the apartment. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 euros sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 750 euros a month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that. I'm looking for a price closer to 800 euros. I'm willing to negotiate, but not at that level. How about 780 euros? That's the lowest I can go. If you're not interested in that price, I'll have to find a tenant who is willing to pay the full asking price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 780 euros is acceptable. I agree to the price of 780 euros a month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm not willing to accept less than 800 euros for this apartment. It's a premium location with all the amenities nearby, and I believe that's the fair market value. If you're not willing to pay that, I'll have to find a tenant who is. Thank you for your time, but I'll have to terminate this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the landlord is not willing to go below 800 euros, which is higher than my budget allows.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand that you may have budget constraints, but the location and quality of the apartment are reflected in the price. If you're unable to meet the asking price, I recommend looking for an apartment that better fits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
